title: Uncaught UnexpectedValueException: closure to have storage
body:
Like in issue #2250, but running psalm 3.6.2@05ace258176795e87ef07b4262b5ceba3fd27de3 with PHP 7.2.4 (on Windows... with a network drive mounted on Q:... dammit!).

The command
```
.\vendor\bin\psalm -r Q:\project_dir --debug-by-line --no-cache
```
gives me:
```
Fatal error: Uncaught UnexpectedValueException: Expecting Q:\project_dir\script\class\ProjectVars.php:129:3053:-:closure to have storage in Q:\project_dir\script\class\ProjectVars.php in C:\Users\xxxxxxx\vendor\vimeo\psalm\src\Psalm\Codebase.php:647
Stack trace:
#0 C:\Users\xxxxxxx\vendor\vimeo\psalm\src\Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\ClosureAnalyzer.php(18): Psalm\Codebase->getClosureStorage('Q:\\project_dir...', 'Q:\\project_dir...')
#1 C:\Users\xxxxxxx\vendor\vimeo\psalm\src\Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\Statements\ExpressionAnalyzer.php(433): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\ClosureAnalyzer->__construct(Object(PhpParser\Node\Expr\Closure), Object(Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\StatementsAnalyzer))
#2 C:\Users\xxxxxxx\vendor\vimeo\psalm\src\Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\Statements\Expression\CallAnalyzer.php(521): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\Statements\ExpressionAnalyzer::analyze(Object in C:\Users\xxxxxxx\vendor\vimeo\psalm\src\Psalm\Codebase.php on line 647
```

The closure is a simple callback for an `usort()`, commenting that closure it give the same error for every closure in the project.
